body.p: As written in FSFE's constitution, two seats in the General Assembly are up for election among Fellows of the FSFE. The election period in 2017 runs from April 10 to April 24, 2017, with eight candidates eligible for election. You can find their personal motivation and presentation of the candidates on our dedicated Fellowship Election 2017 page. In addition, there will be moderated hustings in FSFE's IRC channel in the evenings of March 30 and 31. Please find the detailed schedule and how you can participate at the bottom of our Fellowship Election 2017 page. All orderly Fellows allowed to vote will receive an individual email that includes all information you need to know to vote properly.
